name: bot
description: Visa booking bot using Selenium and Express.js on Railway

scripts.postinstall: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget curl unzip && wget -q -O /tmp/chrome.deb https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && dpkg -i /tmp/chrome.deb || apt-get -fy install && rm /tmp/chrome.deb && npm install chromedriver

author: Anto-4ny
